function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emergence and re-emergence of tick-and mosquito-borne diseases in Canada due to climate change","Impact":"Increased spread of diseases and public health risks","Mitigation":"Implementing urban and suburban planning and design to modulate the risks","Technologies":"Climate-responsive design, green infrastructure, urban heat island mitigation technologies","People":"General public, public health authorities, urban and suburban planners","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban and suburban planners"},{"Description":"Vector-borne diseases responding differently to long-term changes in temperature and rainfall patterns","Impact":"Increased complexity in disease response and management","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of public health strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling, disease surveillance technology","People":"Public health authorities, epidemiologists, climate scientists","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Emergence and spread of new mosquito-borne and tick-borne pathogens in Canada due to climate change","Impact":"Increased risk of novel diseases and public health threats","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance and monitoring of vector populations and disease transmission","Technologies":"Remote sensing technology, GIS mapping, molecular diagnostic tools","People":"Public health authorities, entomologists, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"}]}
